original_title: Charles Manson: The Man Who Killed the Sixties
overview: The events of the night of August 9th, 1969 changed the face of the '60s. The brutal murders of starlet Sharon Tate and her friends shocked the world, and when the Manson Family murderers were found, flower-power culture came under the spotlight.
title: Charles Manson: The Man Who Killed the Sixties
